On 5th December Amir and Ulya Hazrat reported to have, visited InayatullaKhan and urged him to accept appointment of Naib-ul-Sultanat, but latter refused. 3. From several reports it appears that Amir is consistently refusing to adoptanti-British policy, which is being urged by Jemal and his party. 4. Wana column advanced from Dargai storage to Karab Kot on 19th, meetingsome opposition from snipers estimated at from 300 to 500; our casualties 4.Column reported all quiet 21st, and permanent piquets constructed to 4-1- milesbeyond Karab Kot.
